name: Junior Python Backend Developer / Research + Development
description:
Who we are

BairesDev is proud to be the fastest-growing company in America. With people on five continents and world-class clients, we are only as strong as the multicultural teams at the heart of our business. To consistently deliver the highest quality solutions to our clients, we only hire the Top 1% of the best talents and nurture their professional growth on exciting projects.

Junior Python Backend Developer / Research + Development at BairesDev

We are looking for outstanding Junior Python Backend Developers to join BairesDev Research & Development Team (R&D).

Our R&D team is the essential part of our technology solutions that drive millions in revenue every year, so we only hire the best of the best.

Within the team you’ll find many different challenges: Data analysis, Machine Learning, Desktop and web developments are some of the most relevant right now, but in order to drive innovation, you’ll notice that new things are coming up every day!

The R&D area is undoubtedly the most interesting and challenging area of the entire company, and although BairesDev is conformed by really talented people in general, here you will find professionals with extensive experience and also intellectual and creative level, far above average.

We want people to enjoy the trip. Are you ready?

What You Will Do:

- Work closely alongside their Engineering and Business Stakeholders to support the delivery of the project.

- Integrate with the DevOps team to execute tasks.

Here’s what we are looking for:

- 1+ year of practical experience in Python and Django development.

- Experience in development with object-oriented programming is desirable.

- 1 year of development using other programming languages.

- Good skills with XML and relational databases (Oracle / MS SQL / MySQL).

- Professional experience working with large data structures (including XML) and algorithms.

- Advanced English level.

How we do make your work (and your life) easier:

- 100% remote work.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Flexible hours - make your schedule.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- An innovative environment with the structure and resources of a leading multinational.

- Excellent compensation - well above the market average.

- Here you can grow at the speed of your learning curve.

Our people work remotely but with a consistent and robust culture that promotes diversity and teamwork. To continue being the leading software development company in Latin America, we want to ensure that every BairesDev member gets the best growth and professional development opportunities in a diverse, welcoming, and innovative environment.

Every BairesDev team member brings something unique to our company.

We want to hear your story. Apply now!

- Here you can grow at the speed of your learning curve.

Our people work remotely but with a consistent and robust culture that promotes diversity and teamwork. To continue being the leading software development company in Latin America, we want to ensure that every BairesDev member gets the best growth and professional development opportunities in a diverse, welcoming, and innovative environment.

Every BairesDev team member brings something unique to our company.

We want to hear your story. Apply now!

name: Desarrollador Full Stack - Junior
description:
Exclusiva empresa de alquiler de vehículos online busca candidato con gran habilidad y conocimientos solidos sobre el proceso de desarrollo web, capaz de generar soluciones escalables en el marco de una metodología ágil, con conocimientos sobre el uso de patrones que garanticen un código limpio y mantenible que permita su escalabilidad.

- Profesional en carreras afines

Conocimientos básicos en: PHP, Apache, MySQL, API Rest o SOAP, jQuery, Angular 12, Manejo de Linux

Funciones:

- Brindar soluciones para el equipo mediante el desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades y mejoras en el backend y frontend.

- Soporte técnico al equipo comercial y de marketing.

Salario: $1'500.000 - $2'000.000 según experiencia.

Horario: Lunes a Viernes

name: Pasante Universitario Desarrollo Web - Back end, Front end.
description:
Sientes afinidad a todo lo relacionado con DESARROLLO WEB y quieres aprender mas mientras realizas tus pasantias? Si es asi, esta es tu oportunidad!!!

Estamos en busqueda de un pasante que este buscando patrocinio para realizar sus practicas como WEB DEVELOPER.

Funciones:

-Actualizar módulos del sistema con base en requerimientos.

-Darle mantenimiento al sistema, verificando posibles errores.

-Apoyar en la creación de nuevos módulos que permitan automatizar los procesos de la empresa.

-Cumplir con demas funciones estipuladas por supervisor.

Requerimientos:

-Estudiante universitario de desarrollo web, sistemas o carreras afines.

-Afinidad y conocimientos en backend y front end.

-Estudiante en busqueda de pasantias.

-Contrato de aprenziaje.

-Disponibilidad horario de oficina

Si cumples con el perfil, aplica ya!

description:
Estamos en búsqueda de ingeniero de desarrollo con un nivel educativo de estudiante de últimos semestres de carreras como Electrónica, o Telecomunicaciones, o Informática, o software, o Sistemas, o industrial, o carreras afines relacionadas con tecnología, con mínimo seis meses de experiencia como analista, o profesional, o desarrollador de procesos de TI como fábrica de software, o soluciones Informáticas, o integración de plataformas.
